blocks.title: Who we are
blocks.text: BasCal Engineering & Construction specializes in architectural design, MEP engineering, and advanced BIM/VDC services. We develop and coordinate high-precision models for complex projects, integrating architecture, technical networks, and construction-ready data. With national and international experience, we support projects from preconstruction to occupancy, delivering efficient solutions that reduce cost, risk, and rework.

blocks.title: Mission
blocks.text: Deliver detailed, precise, and efficient design and engineering solutions using the latest BIM tools. We produce high-quality models and documentation that optimize coordination, reduce risk, and make construction processes more reliable.

blocks.title: Vision
blocks.text: By 2030, be a regional and international leader in design, engineering, and construction, recognized for excellence in BIM methodologies and compliance with global standards. We aim to integrate sustainable practices and deliver construction solutions that include environmental certifications and energy efficiency.

intro.title: BIM Services
intro.text: We implement BIM to coordinate architectural, structural, and MEP disciplines, delivering construction-ready models that cut clashes and optimize project time and cost.

cards.title: BIM MEP Modeling & Digital Fabrication
cards.text: BIM modeling for mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and fire protection systems with LOD 300–400 focused on coordination and prefabrication.

detail.title: BIM MEP team coordinating field installations
detail.body: Our BIM MEP services are aimed at real field construction. We model mechanical, HVAC, plumbing, electrical, and fire protection systems with practical, field-proven criteria. We deliver LOD 300–400 constructible models that account for real routes, maintenance clearances, install sequencing, and cross-discipline coordination. Models can include supports, hanger layouts, spooling, and prefabricated piping ready for fabrication and installation.
detail.body2: We also act as an extension of the contractor’s team, actively participating in BIM coordination to identify clashes, optimize solutions, and reduce rework. We deliver precise, coordinated, field-ready models that improve site efficiency, cut timelines, and provide tighter cost control.

cards.title: Architectural & Structural BIM Modeling
cards.text: Precise architectural and structural modeling for coordination, documentation, and constructability in the field.

detail.title: Architecture & structure modeling ready for coordination
detail.body: In BIM-driven projects, architectural or structural models often aren’t available or lack the development needed for proper spatial coordination. This limits MEP teams and impacts clash detection and constructability.
detail.body2: We model architecture and structures focused on coordination, planning, and field execution. We deliver constructible, detailed models (concrete up to LOD 400, steel, CMU walls, formwork, geopiles, and vibropiles) to align disciplines early, cut rework, and improve collaboration.

cards.title: BIM Coordination
cards.text: Interdisciplinary coordination, clash management, and technical support following BIM and BEP standards.

detail.title: Integrated BIM coordination on site
detail.body: One of the toughest goals is coordinating systems across disciplines on site. We lead BIM coordination, integrating architectural, structural, and MEP models to eliminate clashes, cut rework, and ensure efficient execution.
detail.body2: We define and enforce BIM standards through the BEP, aligning all project stakeholders to deliver coordinated, construction-ready models with a focus on constructability, schedule, and cost control.

cards.title: Laser Scanning | Scan to BIM | As-Built
cards.text: 3D laser scanning, point clouds, and reliable BIM models for rehabilitation and site control.

blocks.title: 3D Laser Scanning
blocks.text: We perform high-precision 3D laser scanning to capture existing facilities, generating reliable point clouds for modeling and analysis. We combine scanning tech with engineering judgment and field experience to deliver clear, project-aligned data.

blocks.title: Scan to BIM | As-Built Modeling
blocks.text: We turn point clouds into BIM models in Revit per scope, LOD, and project objectives. Faithful as-built models that support architectural/engineering redesign, new-discipline coordination, as-built documentation, and asset operations—using optimized workflows and QA/QC for accuracy and consistency.

blocks.title: As-Built Documentation & Digital Twin
blocks.text: We produce as-built models and drawings from laser scans, redlines, and site records, consolidating the project’s real conditions. When needed, we prep models for asset management/FM, integrating technical data for future operations and maintenance.

cards.title: 4D Construction Sequencing & 5D Cost Planning
cards.text: Model-driven schedule and cost planning. Support for simulation, schedule control, and cost analysis.

detail.title: 4D scheduling and 5D cost planning
detail.body: Model-driven schedule and cost planning. Support for simulation, schedule control, and cost analysis.

cards.title: 6D/7D BIM for Facilities Management | Digital Twinning
cards.text: BIM models focused on operations and maintenance. Structured data for asset management and post-construction decisions.

detail.title: Digital Twin & FM ready to operate
detail.body: BIM models oriented to operations and maintenance, with structured data for asset management and post-construction decision-making.
detail.body2: Digital twins based on BIM models to monitor and analyze assets, supporting operations, maintenance, and lifecycle optimization.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our services, process, and deliverables.

items.q: What is BIM and how does it help my project?
items.a: BIM is a collaborative methodology based on digital models. It helps coordinate disciplines, detect clashes, and reduce rework and costs.

items.q: What deliverables do I receive with a BIM service?
items.a: Depending on scope: LOD 300–400 models, clash reports, drawings, quantities, and technical documentation.

items.q: Which project stages can you support?
items.a: From preconstruction and design to coordination during construction and handover support.

items.q: Do you work with the client’s internal teams?
items.a: Yes. We integrate with your team and standards. We can operate as specialized support (Staff Augmentation) or as a full external team.
